verses.verse: To the <S%H5329>chief<s%> <S%H5329>Musician<s%> upon <S%H7802>Shoshannimeduth,<s%> A <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> of <S%H623>Asaph.<s%> Give <S%H238>ear,<s%> O <S%H7462>Shepherd<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> you that <S%H5090>lead<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> like a <S%H6629>flock;<s%> you that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> between the <S%H3742>cherubim,<s%> <S%H3313>shine<s%> forth.
<S%H6440>Before<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> and <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> and <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> <S%H5782>stir<s%> up your <S%H1369>strength,<s%> and <S%H3212>come<s%> and <S%H3444>save<s%> us.
<S%H7725>Turn<s%> us <S%H7725>again,<s%> O <S%H430>God,<s%> and cause your <S%H6440>face<s%> to <S%H215>shine;<s%> and we shall be <S%H3467>saved.<s%>
O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> <S%H5704>how<s%> <S%H5704>long<s%> will you be <S%H6225>angry<s%> against the <S%H8605>prayer<s%> of your <S%H5971>people?<s%>
You <S%H398>feed<s%> them with the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of <S%H1832>tears;<s%> and give them <S%H1832>tears<s%> to <S%H8248>drink<s%> in <S%H7991>great<s%> <S%H7991>measure.<s%>
You <S%H7760>make<s%> us a <S%H4066>strife<s%> to our <S%H7934>neighbors:<s%> and our <S%H341>enemies<s%> <S%H3932>laugh<s%> among themselves.
<S%H7725>Turn<s%> us <S%H7725>again,<s%> O <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> and cause your <S%H6440>face<s%> to <S%H215>shine;<s%> and we shall be <S%H3467>saved.<s%>
You have <S%H5265>brought<s%> a <S%H1612>vine<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt:<s%> you have <S%H1644>cast<s%> out the <S%H1471>heathen,<s%> and <S%H5193>planted<s%> it.
You <S%H6437>prepared<s%> room <S%H6440>before<s%> it, and did cause it to take <S%H8328>deep<s%> <S%H8327>root,<s%> and it <S%H4390>filled<s%> the <S%H776>land.<s%>
The <S%H2022>hills<s%> were <S%H3680>covered<s%> with the <S%H6738>shadow<s%> of it, and the <S%H6057>boughs<s%> thereof were like the <S%H410>goodly<s%> <S%H730>cedars.<s%>
She <S%H7971>sent<s%> out her <S%H7105>boughs<s%> to the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> and her <S%H3127>branches<s%> to the <S%H5104>river.<s%>
<S%H4100>Why<s%> have you then <S%H6555>broken<s%> down her <S%H1447>hedges,<s%> so that <S%H3605>all<s%> they which <S%H5674>pass<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> do <S%H717>pluck<s%> her?
The <S%H2386>boar<s%> out of the <S%H3293>wood<s%> does <S%H3765>waste<s%> it, and the <S%H2123>wild<s%> <S%H2123>beast<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> does <S%H7462>devour<s%> it.

<S%H7725>Return,<s%> we <S%H4994>beseech<s%> you, O <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts:<s%> <S%H5027>look<s%> down from <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and <S%H7200>behold,<s%> and <S%H6485>visit<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H1612>vine;<s%>
And the <S%H3657>vineyard<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> your <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand<s%> has <S%H5193>planted,<s%> and the <S%H1121>branch<s%> that you made <S%H553>strong<s%> for yourself.
It is <S%H8313>burned<s%> with <S%H784>fire,<s%> it is <S%H3683>cut<s%> down: they <S%H6>perish<s%> at the <S%H1606>rebuke<s%> of your <S%H6440>countenance.<s%>
Let your <S%H3027>hand<s%> be on the <S%H376>man<s%> of your <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand,<s%> on the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%> whom you made <S%H553>strong<s%> for yourself.
So will not we <S%H5472>go<s%> <S%H5472>back<s%> from you: <S%H2421>quicken<s%> us, and we will <S%H7121>call<s%> on your <S%H8034>name.<s%>
<S%H7725>Turn<s%> us <S%H7725>again,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> cause your <S%H6440>face<s%> to <S%H215>shine;<s%> and we shall be <S%H3467>saved.<s%>
